plot: Lucy struggles to come to terms with her parents' separation. She rescues a dog Eliot from the local dog shelter and her life starts to improve. Tragedy strikes when Eliot goes missing and Lucy must go on a dangerous journey to find him.
title: Eliot & Me
plot_es: Lucy struggles to come to terms with her parents' separation. She rescues a dog Eliot from the local dog shelter and her life starts to improve. Tragedy strikes when Eliot goes missing and Lucy must go on a dangerous journey to find him.
plot_en: Lucy struggles to come to terms with her parents' separation. She rescues a dog Eliot from the local dog shelter and her life starts to improve. Tragedy strikes when Eliot goes missing and Lucy must go on a dangerous journey to find him.
